front.name: Emotion
front.desc:
Oracle cards can answer questions.
Use these cards to answer what someone is feeling, or what emotion a thing or event would spark.

back.name: Ecstacy
back.desc:
Ecstacy, Joy, or Serenity.
When mixed with Vigilance, yields Optimism.
When mixed with Admiration, yields Love.

front.name: Emotion
front.desc:
Oracle cards can answer questions.
Use these cards to answer what someone is feeling, or what emotion a thing or event would spark.

back.name: Admiration
back.desc:
Admiration, Trust, or Acceptance.
When mixed with Ecstacy, yields Love.
When mixed with Terror, yields Submission.

front.name: Emotion
front.desc:
Oracle cards can answer questions.
Use these cards to answer what someone is feeling, or what emotion a thing or event would spark.

back.name: Terror
back.desc:
Terror, Fear, or Apprehension.
When mixed with Admiration, yields Submission.
When mixed with Amazement, yields Awe.

front.name: Emotion
front.desc:
Oracle cards can answer questions.
Use these cards to answer what someone is feeling, or what emotion a thing or event would spark.

back.name: Amazement
back.desc:
Amazement, Surprise, or Distraction.
When mixed with Terror, yields Awe.
When mixed with Grief, yields Disapproval.

front.name: Emotion
front.desc:
Oracle cards can answer questions.
Use these cards to answer what someone is feeling, or what emotion a thing or event would spark.

back.name: Grief
back.desc:
Grief, Sadness, or Pensiveness.
When mixed with Amazement, yields Disapproval.
When mixed with Loathing, yields Remorse.

front.name: Emotion
front.desc:
Oracle cards can answer questions.
Use these cards to answer what someone is feeling, or what emotion a thing or event would spark.

back.name: Loathing
back.desc:
Loathing, Disgust, or Boredom.
When mixed with Loathing, yields Remorse.
When mixed with Rage, yields Contempt.

front.name: Emotion
front.desc:
Oracle cards can answer questions.
Use these cards to answer what someone is feeling, or what emotion a thing or event would spark.

back.name: Rage
back.desc:
Rage, Anger, or Annoyance.
When mixed with Loathing, yields Contempt.
When mixed with Vigilance, yields Aggressiveness.

front.name: Emotion
front.desc:
Oracle cards can answer questions.
Use these cards to answer what someone is feeling, or what emotion a thing or event would spark.

back.name: Vigilance
back.desc:
Vigilance, Anticipation, or Interest.
When mixed with Rage, yields Aggressiveness.
When mixed with Ecstacy, yields Optimism.
